Software Engineer

**Jun 2022 - Present (2 yr, 4 m) • hyderabad, india • full-time**

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

*   Built UX screens and supporting back-end APIs allowing customers to move their inactive content (SharePoint Sites) to the cost efficient archive tier and reactivating back to active tier as part of Microsoft 365 Archive.
    
*   Developed a dedicated SPList (SharePoint List) for storing archived sites, addressing the view threshold issue. This significantly improved search functionality, enabling the simultaneous search of up to 50,000 sites compared to the previous limit of 5,000 sites
    
*   Engineered a CAML query solution building on top of existing query operators, adding support for bit-wise operations on integer fields in the SPList schema which is otherwise unsupported.
    
*   Wrote an on-demand cron job for processing large number of artifacts (max. 10k at a time) from multiple Microsoft 365 services like SharePoint, Exchange and OneDrive then adding them into restore session.

Software Engineer

Jun 2022 - Present (2 yr, 4 m) • hyderabad, india • full-time

  • Built UX screens and supporting back-end APIs allowing customers to move their inactive content (SharePoint Sites) to the cost efficient archive tier and reactivating back to active tier as part of Microsoft 365 Archive.

  • Developed a dedicated SPList (SharePoint List) for storing archived sites, addressing the view threshold issue. This significantly improved search functionality, enabling the simultaneous search of up to 50,000 sites compared to the previous limit of 5,000 sites

  • Engineered a CAML query solution building on top of existing query operators, adding support for bit-wise operations on integer fields in the SPList schema which is otherwise unsupported.

  • Wrote an on-demand cron job for processing large number of artifacts (max. 10k at a time) from multiple Microsoft 365 services like SharePoint, Exchange and OneDrive then adding them into restore session.
